snippet: BAUMEISTER--Matthew C. 4/5/86 - 5/11/05 Dearest Matthew, for eleven years we have missed you - yearned to hold you, see your smile, hear your laugh. The ache of your loss is always there. Every day you are in our thoughts. Every day you are in our hearts. Every day you are loved. Mom, Dad & Jared 1/3
lead_paragraph: BAUMEISTER--Matthew C. 4/5/86 - 5/11/05 Dearest Matthew, for eleven years we have missed you - yearned to hold you, see your smile, hear your laugh. The ache of your loss is always there. Every day you are in our thoughts. Every day you are in our hearts. Every day you are loved. Mom, Dad & Jared 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BAUMEISTER, MATTHEW C
